message: Net@Night apparently, Nice to see Convore get the attention it deserves!
Did this Group get a plug on TWiT Live? Grown so fast!
yes it got a twit live plug
I prefer the IRC because it is more interactive and I don't have to go back to a topic

@darthlunchbox Theres no real embedding aside from an image. It really is the perfect middle ground for those who want to partake in a discussion but dont want to get lost in IRC (Atleast for TWiT folks). Be sure to checkout other groups though through the discover button at the top, some real great ones out there.
@maglockd IRC is a contant flow, and you cant really go back to a topic and follow the discussion. You are either in or out. (One large discussion vs Several small ones)
@craigrood I have no idea what this is useful for. Enlighten me..

@darthlunchbox Sure, Convore follows the Forum model (Post, Threads, Forum) but instead of fixed forums theres groups. Unlike a forum though anyone can create groups (public or private) and post away on their desired topic. Convore posting is really what sets it aside from traditional forums, it brings smaller and simpler postings much like a traditional IRC chat
